experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Beanbag AI
workDescription: Enhanced Beanbag AI by integrating analytics for tracking and analyzing campaign performance, providing users with actionable insights.
Spearheaded the development of an automation tool using Puppeteer to automate back-end tasks and reduce manual effort.
Designed and implemented automation features with Puppeteer and Express.js, streamlining repetitive processes for improved efficiency.
Regularly monitored and optimized performance of automation and analytics tools to ensure seamless operation and scalability.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Crewscale
workDescription: Developed full-stack web applications using React and Node.js, ensuring seamless backend integration and data flow.
Deployed applications on AWS, leveraging services like EC2 and S3 for scalable and secure solutions.
Implemented Sentry for error tracking and performance monitoring, enhancing application reliability and user experience.
Managed version control through GitHub and coordinated project tasks using Jira, ensuring efficient collaboration and agile delivery.
